website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line kit that you'd expect to spend a lot more money for.
pros: Powerful, with a crisp, clear sound
Speakers are easy to install and long-lasting
cons: Some buyers report static at high volumes

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a pair of Kicker tweeters that I got for $50 about 2 years ago. These were $10 more so I was really curious if they would be a better replacement. I installed one on the right side and left the Kicker tweeter on the left side to compare. Played some rap, rock and acoustical music and my attention kept turning towards the the Fosgate tweeter. It sounded more natural and clearer. Took the Kicker tweeter out and put the Fosgate tweeter in and was satisfied with the sound quality. I highly recommend these if you want something that sounds natural and clear. I used the -4db input on the crossover if anybody wants to know.
customer_reviews.author: Terminator

customer_reviews.title: Really tweak em
customer_reviews.text: These are great and easy to install, but I would sit and adjust them to your liking as they really do PUNCH you in the face. I set mine to the -4db setting and it sounds great. Highly recommend. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Alex J

customer_reviews.title: Great tweeters for price.
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are great for the price. I put these in my tweeter mounts in my jk wrangler to replace the stock ones. I did do a little modification so I would be able to use the Rockford grill and it looks great. Very sturdy and they also sound great. These are great for the price if you’re wanting to upgrade your old tweeters or even add some. You can’t go wrong with these. Feel free to comment and ask questions.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Jones

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters sound amazing for their price and the great thing about them is they come with their own crossover with -4 -2 and O db settings i have mine on -4 and they are loud I recommend them if you have alot of bass. I would also like to add that i have compared these to Skar Audio’s SPX-T component tweeter and the P1TS out performs it imo
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality sounds that Rockford makes. I changed out all my door speakers with Rockford Fosgates 6 1/2 all I needed was to add the tweeters it makes a world of difference. Glad I decided to go with my purchase matter of fact going to order me another set to put for my back seat riders . Thanks again amazon very satisfied with product and had the best price out there compared to everybody else.
customer_reviews.author: Richard tassoni

customer_reviews.title: Bad crossovers
customer_reviews.text: The crossovers are bad. Don't know if it's all of them but I have read other reviews after sending mine back that had the same problem. Tweeters might work without crossovers, but I wouldn't pay for crossovers that don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality in sound and material!
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are very clear and the crossovers are very simple to install even if you dont have an amp. Replaced my old Boss tweeters which didn't come close to the quality of these. The Tweeter drives are heavy and quality soldering for the connections. Comes with everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Chris L

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers
customer_reviews.text: Running them with a mid speakers and they are loud and really quality. Have them in my 08 titan
customer_reviews.author: Max Lemyzhanski

customer_reviews.title: Substancial sound quality improvement
customer_reviews.text: Just loved the sound improvement these made on my 2010 nissan titan. Best nice to have investment made so far
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Acosta

customer_reviews.title: No so great for upgraded music
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product but I had a issuse with the box it was send back a signal to my amp and causing it to trip any time I try to raise the volume. I switch the amp and my other amp broke
customer_reviews.author: Rakeeb Hosein

customer_reviews.title: Add a pair of rockford mid loudspeakers and you got a winning combo
customer_reviews.text: These and a pair of Rockford mid loudspeakers made my car sound amazing !

customer_reviews.title: Clean highs but can be kinda bright
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and when powered right sound great. Can be kinda distorted at times but I only just hooked them up. They are a great edition if you are looking for tweeters.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super loud and crisp tweeters the best I've ever purchased

customer_reviews.text: These tweeters sound good...i had installed new speakers and need more voice these speakers did the job

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tweeters to replace the stock ones, as I replaced the other speakers in my car. I am very pleased with the speakers. They are very clear when the head unit is tuned right. Well worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Sound great when setup correctly
customer_reviews.text: Sound great when setup correctly, take the time to EQ and set up sound stage and you will be very happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in 2013 Ford F150
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfect in my Ford. No need for the supplied clips. Easy install and great sound. Not to loud and it kicks perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: These were a nice addition to the 8 inch 2way's I put in ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a nice addition to the 8 inch 2way's I put in the doors very crisp and clean sound love them and would definatley recommend them as well as amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan sanedon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this to go with a 20rms head unit
customer_reviews.text: Sharp with not too much 'bite'. Would recommend this to go with a 20rms head unit, 60w rms woofers. Have not tried with amp but I'm sure they'd do fine with a 30-50 extra watts

customer_reviews.title: ... ones from my 2013 ford f150 fx2 and they're amazing the sound it's great
customer_reviews.text: I replace original ones from my 2013 ford f150 fx2 and they're amazing the sound it's great. I'll buy them again in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Tweeter placement is essential sound not too be at ear level of passenger's...
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this , but should have gotten two pair. Sound super clear and makes it all come together nicely..
customer_reviews.author: Miguel R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price. Wiring is super easy. And they sound so good. I recommend these to everyone now

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding Tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Not earsplitting loud but they are well constructed and sound great 👍

customer_reviews.title: These little things are amazing...fully satisfied..had to change those stock jeep tweets
customer_reviews.text: These little things are amazing...fully satisfied..had to change those stock jeep tweets

customer_reviews.text: I have not had them installed yet, but the quality is very nice. I will update once I get them installed.

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade, I recomend them to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I installed them on F150 2016 Lariat, the tweeters sound is now very clear, great upgrade, I recomend them to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: These little gems r powerful and r crisp sound. You need a amp to make them come alive but when they do WOW!

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality vast improvement
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me! Packaging arrived well in the cover. No defects.
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Without the Harshness
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these tweeters to augment my subwoofer and it does the job nicely. These tweeters does not sound as high or crisp as some tweeters I have heard but they do reproduce the high, crisp enough sound without hurting your ears. They blend well with my door; center and rear speakers; and subwoofer. The tweeters create a natural sound that I enjoy immensely.
customer_reviews.author: R. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair: this is the second pair i buy because i love how crisp they sound. I turn them up loud and they hold up perfectly. Very happy! 1st pair:Awesome tweets. I previously purchased the power edition, about $200. They burned when i turned them up. Bought them again and happened again. My entire sound system is RF. Thennnn i decided to go with these...nothing has happened to them yet! Awesome sounds, very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Montoy

customer_reviews.title: Rockford Fosgate Punch P1T-S Tweeter kit
customer_reviews.text: My Rockford Fosgate tweeter works great with just a head unit pushing them.

customer_reviews.title: best tweeters I bought
customer_reviews.text: It sounds AWESOME! I use this with a four channel Rockford Fosgate amp and the sound quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Cloutier

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much in my truck
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set, for a different vehicle. I liked them so much in my truck, I installed them in my Focus. Very clear sound, adds just the right element I was missing

customer_reviews.title: cheap tweet works great
customer_reviews.text: For starter tweets they are good alittle harsh but set them to the -4 db and they sound alot better now .....

customer_reviews.title: They sound great, they even out my p3 shallow mount 12's
customer_reviews.text: Put these in my 07 avalanche,an WOW!!!!! They sound great, they even out my p3 shallow mount 12's. worth the money as well.

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh
customer_reviews.text: These tweeters are way to harsh. And the sound quality is less then ideal. I bought these to replace the tweeters from my Kenwood components that were way to quite.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bonds

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Clean, nice, made my highs more clear, a little hissy, but with toonage it sounds gorg.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Best tweeters in this price range!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product all I will ever run is rockford fosgate punch series speakers because they sound amazing all i did was swap these out with my old stock tweeters that were 12 years old in my 2002 Honda Accord and the clarity is crystal clear they sound twice as loud as my stock ones. made such a difference i had to turn the equalizer on my deck down just for break in period. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tweeters and the crossovers are excellent. Powering them with the fosgate p400x4 have no clipping issues or over power issues. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dill Pickle

customer_reviews.title: Suddenly, it all became so clear. I knew then and there what I was supposed to---Oh wait.....
customer_reviews.text: Made my system sound WAY better! The only bad thing is I lost one of the mounts for it and had to just tape it in place w/elec tape. Looks ok, cant tell if not looking for it, but damn.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Converse

customer_reviews.title: They have pretty good sound but was looking for something with more ...
customer_reviews.text: They have pretty good sound but was looking for something with more slap. Not that it doesn't have it. I just have to buy another set. Make my wife hold her ears alllllllll the way to work
customer_reviews.author: David Edwards

customer_reviews.title: rockford fosgate
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and I have used it before, but one of the round tweeter came blown, it cracks when the music is on
customer_reviews.author: edna hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Quality made product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a chance to hook up or even mount this product yet, but what more can I say it is made and branded by Rockford Fosgate! Always been a great product and by the looks and feel seems like a quality product with many different ways to mount. Always leave a review because this is how I order products I'm not sure of. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: An Inadequate purchase
customer_reviews.text: Trim prices included with my shipment were warped and not as the product was intended to be. Very disappointed with my purchase

customer_reviews.text: for 3 days they did well but then the crossovers burned up and it burned threw my door.don't buy!i mad as fudge right now
customer_reviews.author: tirrell roch

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is poor
customer_reviews.text: This weren’t the worst speakers I’ve heard in this price range but they’re pretty bad. They distorted easily and sounded tinny. I got them to replace a set of tweeters that were part of an Alpine component speaker set. I was hoping to get something decent while avoiding the $100+ price tag. They weren’t worth it and were only slightly better than a similar set of Pioneer tweeters. I returned them and eventually bought new Alpine tweeters that were far better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: These are great little tweeters and I like the crossover it has too. They are a little of the high side when you hear symbols, but I adjusted them down to -4bd which helped. Instructions were useless on how to hook up to a head unit or if your hooking them up with factory wires and aftermarket component speakers. Glad there's the internet that helped out.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Best updrade without adding amp.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace the horrible factory tweeters in the F150. Install was fairly easy and the crossovers are small enough to stuff in the empty space at the bottom of the A-pillar. These are 60 RMS and I don't have an amp on them and they sound amazing (had to adjust the treble down actually). The system will get a full upgrade with amps, but these will probably stay as part of the upgrade! 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Rob Tacker

customer_reviews.title: Good tweeter but a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but I think they are a little overpriced. Look on youtube for installation
customer_reviews.author: Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. Small enough to fit perfectly on my car dash.
customer_reviews.author: gecha

customer_reviews.title: These things are great. They are really bright
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. They are really bright. I had to lower output of the treble because they will scream at higher volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Biff Droddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tweeters
customer_reviews.text: Great tweeters. Used these to replace the ones in my 2013 Silverados factory location an it made a world of difference.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from such small tweeters. I just installed them in my 2015 Civic SI and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Good little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap nice little tweeters. Cut as many connectors out and solderd them instead sounds great.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: speakers are fine, haven't used the crossovers since I have an alternative

customer_reviews.title: Good pair.
customer_reviews.text: Easy in stall in 2019 ford f150 in stock location.
customer_reviews.author: input

customer_reviews.title: The Highs are High
customer_reviews.text: The highs are extra high. People always comment on my vehicle's clear highs.
customer_reviews.author: W R

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I have a Rockford Fosgate amp and 2 P3 12 inch subs in my car. I love Rockford and i am in the process of Rockfording out my car. These things give me the highs i need. My system pushed so much bass and having these hooked up in the back really gives it the highs i like coming from behind me. It sounds so good! I highly recommend this! Especially to those who have a system and need some extra highs!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: Speakers sound so good i want to get a few more to add to the back of the car...crisp sound and not hard to hook up..for the money you cant beat the deal!
customer_reviews.author: ronale d johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These drop right into to the A-Pillar on a 2013 f-150. They sound excellent with a stock system and when I upgraded to some amps they sound even better obviously. They aren't too high as some people are stating, I think you just have to adjust the crossover levels to get some of the pitch out of it.
customer_reviews.author: sully

customer_reviews.title: The left hand doesn't know what the right hand is doing
customer_reviews.text: HEY, maybe they should make sure the tweeter can actually plug into the included crossover...What do you think? Before you try to install them check it out, otherwise you'll be running to the store to buy some terminal crimps!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Love Thies things
customer_reviews.text: Thies. Things are crazy I love them I hooked them up on 0 db. I have a 12 inch Orion hcca sub with a 1000 Watt Kenwood. N b4 I hooked Thies up u couldn't here's my high's or mids at all the sub overe powered them now I can here everything from the sub bass my 6x5 mids and every single high u could imagine my system went from a over powered sub systems to a all around high quality sound system
customer_reviews.author: cary-Lee F.

customer_reviews.title: pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: Installed them in my jeep about 3 years ago they still sound as they did the first day, and im a heavy listener. That being said they are not what you would expect from Rockford fosgate products, they do not sound 100% crisp but they do the job, the average listener wouldnt be able to notice the dfference either way. Over all good if you need to replace old tweeters, if your looking for performance you would have to step up to there power series tweeter
customer_reviews.author: Randy G.

customer_reviews.title: great price great product
customer_reviews.text: great product great price. Very happy with my purchase. I would recommend this to anyone. I bought it as a replacement tweeter for my RF door component system
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tweeters. Install was very easy and the kit came with everything you'll need.
customer_reviews.text: These little things are awesome. Replaced factory stereo and changed all the speakers to Rockford Fosgate, sound is a million times better and has plenty of power for a daily driver.
customer_reviews.author: Most Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: sounds clear but when raised to high volumes there's a slight static
customer_reviews.author: Officialshotz

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: SOUNDS GOOD, ITS JUST THAT THE CROSSOVER IS TOO BIG....
customer_reviews.author: kiongbee

customer_reviews.title: Great highs and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great set of tweeters. Compliment any system very well. It is all about placement at that point. Tweeters are for highs. So do not put them to close to your sub (if you have one) or you will lose your highs. Closer to you is great for a better listening experience. Overall a great buy and worth the money. Easy to install. And a great compliment to any system.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Waters

customer_reviews.title: this is just right
customer_reviews.text: Product is working as described in my SG Note 3. quick read / write etc. no probs. seller is to be patronized. This tweeter can be made to play high mid, and some mid tweet
customer_reviews.author: LEPER1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one part of tweeters I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cobz

product_meta.title: Rockford Fosgate P1T-S Punch 1" Tweeter Kit (Pair)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingSince day one, we have spearheaded the car audio revolution. Nothing has changed. Rockford Fosgate is still the global leader in audio innovation and your passion is our purpose. We engineer the best audio systems for your lifestyle!

AMAZON.COM
Car audio fanatics will love the Punch series tweeter kit. It features a 1" (25mm) PEI dome, cool-looking outboard crossover, and three mounting bezels to accomodate various installations.

THE ROCKFORD FOSGATE PRIME SERIES
A new generation of performance geared toward the "novice" car audio enthusiast, the Prime series full-range and component speakers feature legendary Rockford Fosgate sound quality while fitting into any budget. 



R1T-S FEATURES
 * One-inch PEI dome tweeters 
 * Butyl rubber surround 
 * Recessed tweeter mount uses standard 1-3/4" hole saw 
 * Multiple mounding configurations: flush-surface-angle 
 * External high-pass crossovers (3.5KHz @ 12dB/octave Butterworth) 

DDC Tweeter Mounting
Rockford's DDC (Discreet Dual Clamp) Tweeter Mounting provides concentric clamping pressure around the perimeter of the mounting hole. This results in maximimum ease of installation. 

Car audio fanatics will love the Punch series tweeter kit. 
Click to enlarge. 




R1T-S SPECIFICATIONS


Configuration: Tweeter Kit Midrange Diameter: n/a Midrange Depth: n/a Tweeter Diameter: 1.0" (25mm) Tweeter Depth: 0.50" (13mm) Frequency Response: 3.5kHz - 22kHz Power Handling: 60 Watts RMS�
120 Watts Max Crossover: High-Pass (HP): 3.5KHz @ 12dB/octave Butterworth Sensitivity: 90dB @ 1 watt/1 meter Grilles Included: Yes Mounting Hardware: Yes 




THIRTY YEARS OF ROCKFORD FOSGATE
Rockford Fosgate products have been designed and engineered in Tempe, Arizona since the beginning. Rockford's 30 year reputation is grounded in engineering and manufacturing some of the finest audio products in the world. The company's no-compromise approach has yielded patented iconic products such as the Punch EQ, Punch 45 amplifier and the 3Sixty integrated signal processor. Today, Rockford's new products push the performance envelope even further. Each new product is a step forward--they sound bigger, they play louder, and run longer. Rockford never settles for "good enough." The 2010 product line represents the company's core philosophy. Rockfords new amplifiers, speakers and subwoofers have raised the bar on the competition. 




WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Rockford Fosgate Punch P1T-S Tweeter Kit, Grilles/Trim Rings, Mounting Hardware, Tweeter Surface/Angle/Flush Mounts, User's Manual ROCKFORD FOSGATE TWEETER KITS


Good: Rockford Fosgate Prime R1T-S 1-Inch Tweeter Kit Better: Rockford Fosgate Punch P1T-S Tweeter Kit Best: Rockford Fosgate Power T1T-S Tweeter Set
feature_bullets: The Punch P1T-S is a 1” PEI dome tweeter kit allows you to easily add on additional highs with natural sound reproduction

The P1T-S 4-Ohm black tweeters come as a pair, have a power handling of 60 Watts RMS/120 Watts Max and include cool looking outboard crossovers, and 3 mounting bezels to accommodate various installations
Recessed tweeter mount uses standard 1-3/4" hole saw and can be installed for flush, surface and angle configurations
Famous Rockford Fosgate build quality with a full 1-year warranty when purchased from an authorized Rockford Fosgate reseller
Tweeter system with 120 watts maximum power handling (60 watts RMS)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars185 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
